channel.title: PHP SDKs on PHPDrone
channel.description: Recent content in PHP SDKs on PHPDrone

item.title: Drone Plugin PHP SDK
item.description: Allows for creating PHP based plugins. <?php require __DIR__."/vendor/autoload.php"; // Get the build : $build = new \DronePluginSdk\Build(); // Get some settings : var_dump($build->getPluginParameter('my_parameter'));``` Full API documentation is available at http://phpdrone.github.io/drone-plugin-sdk/
